It's working on my machine just fine. Horrible game, though... runs really badly on my computer which, while not cutting-edge, is quite powerful. It's not optimised in the least, the engine is terrible, you have limited camera control, and there are issues with the sound.

It's a shame, because this could be fun in the hands of a competent team... perhaps this is the beta copy? I don't know, but as it is, it's not worth anyone's time.
This is the real thing everyone. works fine for me all the way. but the game in it self is crap. i think ship simulator 2009 is better.

Any ideas?

http://www.shipsim.com/downloads/updates 

No prob :)

That isn't the update to solve the black screen problem. That is the update for the game itself.
The black screen upon startup is caused by corrupt files from the STEAM download. The same as this torrent.
Only if you have bought the game from steam, it will download a special ''steam'' update for the game.

After installation it comes up with 3 boxes to tick:
Direct x
Physics
Microsoft Redistributable Visual C++

I have ticked them all but it wont install Direct x or Physics. All it does is come up with error messeges.
The weird thing is that the game starts to load up after but then it just goes to a black screen and does nothing.

Here is the solution:
Well. the game need to install (It's better to find from your own the latest DirectX, Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable anf the latest FhysX from Nvidia. 
And other way is to download the demo version
from the original website of the game.
It contains correctly all the above programs.
Also you have to be sure that you have the latest vga graphic drivers.
Well, the game can be install fine on win7.
WinXp needs to go to program folder and right click to file QuestViewer.
Set compatibility to win98/winMe2000.
That was the cause the game crashed after setup
procedure.
Hope I helped.
